name: SYNPRINT AC 4110
description:
SYNPRINT AC 4110 is a water-based, cationic acrylic copolymer solution. SYNPRINT AC 4110 is recommended for primers with excellent adhesion on critical substrates such as metallised foil. Moreover, films formulated with SYNPRINT AC 4110 form a receptive layer for water-based anionic inks. The low minimum film-forming temperature allows the formulation of low-VOC formulations.

Features and Benefits:


	Excellent adhesion to a wide variety of substrates
	Excellent bonding of anionic inks Low MFFT
	Excellent, universal stain-blocking properties
	Free of APEO and co-solvents
